name: The Long Winter (JaGTeK Games)
description:
Caught in a plane crash with your lifelong friend, you are trapped in a winter wasteland filled with peculiar structures and even more peculiar creatures. Can you gather supplies to stay warm and well-fed, and venture out into the long winter to find your friend?

How to play:

- Left-click to perform an action on a tile

- Right-click to cycle potential actions for a tile

- Actions include moving, interacting, fighting and more

- Open your inventory by performing the player action on the player's tile

- Additional campfires can be created from the inventory with a single branch

- Campfire tiles allow for refuelling and cooking actions to be performed

- The cooking action will cook all meat in the inventory

- Click the green button in the inventory to use items, including equipping weapons and equipment

- Drop items with the red button

- Press escape to pause and find the settings menu

- Hover over the stat icons in the top left to see the precise numbers of your health, hunger and temperature time

- These numbers can be displayed permanently in the settings menu
